title: Piece of Love
description:
An entry to the "Silent Manga Audition" in 2013.
Winner of the 5th tier "The Honourable Mention Award"

The author, going by "Alhamra," is from Indonesia.

From the author: "It tells about how strong a love can be without leaving the Indonesian cultures in the manga."

https://www.manga-audition.com/2013award/
https://www.manga-audition.com/2013award/12/20_Alhamra.pdf
https://readmanga.live/list/person/alhamra?sortType=updated
